00036 #pragma mark -
00037 #pragma mark Logging
00038 
00054 // FTLOGEXT logging macro from: http://iphoneincubator.com/blog/debugging/the-evolution-of-a-replacement-for-nslog
00055 #ifdef DEBUG
00056 #define FTLOG(...) NSLog(__VA_ARGS__)
00057 #define FTLOGEXT(fmt, ...) NSLog((@"%s [Line %d] " fmt), __PRETTY_FUNCTION__, __LINE__, ##__VA_ARGS__);
00058 #define FTLOGCALL FTLOG(@"[%@ %@]", NSStringFromClass([self class]), NSStringFromSelector(_cmd))
00059 #else
00060 #define FTLOG(...) /* */
00061 #define FTLOGEXT(...) /* */
00062 #define FTLOGCALL /* */
00063 #endif

00068 #pragma mark -
00069 #pragma mark Memory Management
00070 
00074 #define FTRELEASE(_obj) [_obj release], _obj = nil
00075 
00079 #define FTFREE(_ptr) if(_ptr != NULL) { free(_ptr); _ptr = NULL; }

00085 #pragma mark Math

00087 #define DEGREES_TO_RADIANS(d) (d * M_PI / 180)
00088 #define RADIANS_TO_DEGREES(r) (r * 180 / M_PI)

00096 #pragma mark -
00097 #pragma mark Colors
00098 
00102 #define RGBCOLOR(r,g,b) \
00103 [UIColor colorWithRed:r/256.f green:g/256.f blue:b/256.f alpha:1.f]
00104 
00108 #define RGBACOLOR(r,g,b,a) \
00109 [UIColor colorWithRed:r/256.f green:g/256.f blue:b/256.f alpha:a]
00110 
00114 #define UIColorFromRGB(rgbValue) \
00115 [UIColor \
00116   colorWithRed:((float)((rgbValue & 0xFF0000) >> 16))/255.0 \
00117          green:((float)((rgbValue & 0x00FF00) >> 8))/255.0 \
00118           blue:((float)(rgbValue & 0x0000FF))/255.0 \
00119          alpha:1.0]
00120 
00126 #define UIColorFromRGBA(rgbValue, alphaValue) \
00127 [UIColor \
00128   colorWithRed:((float)((rgbValue & 0xFF0000) >> 16))/255.0 \
00129          green:((float)((rgbValue & 0x00FF00) >> 8))/255.0 \
00130           blue:((float)(rgbValue & 0x0000FF))/255.0 \
00131          alpha:alphaValue]

00136 #pragma mark -
00137 #pragma mark Delegates
00138 
00142 #define FT_CALL_DELEGATE(_delegate, _selector) \
00143 do { \
00144   id _theDelegate = _delegate; \
00145   if(_theDelegate != nil && [_theDelegate respondsToSelector:_selector]) { \
00146     [_theDelegate performSelector:_selector]; \
00147   } \
00148 } while(0);
00149 
00153 #define FT_CALL_DELEGATE_WITH_ARG(_delegate, _selector, _argument) \
00154 do { \
00155   id _theDelegate = _delegate; \
00156   if(_theDelegate != nil && [_theDelegate respondsToSelector:_selector]) { \
00157     [_theDelegate performSelector:_selector withObject:_argument]; \
00158   } \
00159 } while(0);
00160 
00164 #define FT_CALL_DELEGATE_WITH_ARGS(_delegate, _selector, _arg1, _arg2) \
00165 do { \
00166   id _theDelegate = _delegate; \
00167   if(_theDelegate != nil && [_theDelegate respondsToSelector:_selector]) { \
00168     [_theDelegate performSelector:_selector withObject:_arg1 withObject:_arg2]; \
00169   } \
00170 } while(0);

00176 #pragma mark -
00177 #pragma mark File System
00178 
00184 static inline NSString *FTPathForFileInDocumentsDirectory(NSString *filename) {
00185   NSArray *paths = NSSearchPathForDirectoriesInDomains(NSDocumentDirectory, NSUserDomainMask, YES);
00186   NSString *documentsDirectory = [paths objectAtIndex:0];
00187   NSString *path = [documentsDirectory stringByAppendingPathComponent:filename];
00188   return path;
00189 }

00194 #pragma mark -
00195 #pragma mark Core Data
00196 
00200 #define FT_SAVE_MOC(_ft_moc) \
00201 do { \
00202   NSError* _ft_save_error; \
00203   if(![_ft_moc save:&_ft_save_error]) { \
00204     FTLOG(@"Failed to save to data store: %@", [_ft_save_error localizedDescription]); \
00205     NSArray* _ft_detailedErrors = [[_ft_save_error userInfo] objectForKey:NSDetailedErrorsKey]; \
00206     if(_ft_detailedErrors != nil && [_ft_detailedErrors count] > 0) { \
00207       for(NSError* _ft_detailedError in _ft_detailedErrors) { \
00208         FTLOG(@"DetailedError: %@", [_ft_detailedError userInfo]); \
00209       } \
00210     } \
00211     else { \
00212       FTLOG(@"%@", [_ft_save_error userInfo]); \
00213     } \
00214   } \
00215 } while(0);
